name: Purvi
greetingText: Wishing you smiles, surprises, and everything nice today!
wishText: Wishing you joy, laughter, and all the beautiful moments life can offer! 🎂✨
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you, Purvi ❤️!! Yayyyyyyy! Many many happy returns of the day. Hope you have the best year ahead!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come and tell me if you liked it!
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
